page.title: 07COMMENTS ON STOTTESDON LIFE
page.content: "..a very friendly place..Snows in winter are a problem as there are banks from Stottesdon village in all directions..snowploughs..late clearing our areas..hazardous." "..rural relaxed community..people accept you as you are..interest & care shown by friends & neighbours." "..everyone knows everyone else..very little class distinction..we appreciate our privacy ..you do need a vehicle to get to shops, doctor.." "..a very beautiful county..away from the constant bustle of industrial chaos..the roads could receive more attention. Some of them are dangerous & in a shocking condition.." "..The village has changed but not too drastically.." "This village has become a dead end, little or no social activities for older people..very limited transport." "I like living in Stottesdon.."
